text: KS Azoty-Puławy is a men's handball club from Puławy, Poland, that plays in the Superliga. ==Titles== * Superliga: ** 16px 3rd: 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 * Cup of Poland: ** 16px 2nd: 2018 ==European record== {| class="wikitable" !
